title: Set alias for columns in data set, but in expression builder the old column names are displayed when selecting the dataset
OB: When setting an alias for columns in a data set, the old column names are still displayed in the expression builder when selecting the dataset.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Create a new data source and a dataset. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset, e.g. 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
